Will you work on any other apps?

They will all be free and open source. I have no plans to create apps for money. (Iâ€™ll be retired â€” not working for money anymore is the point.)

Every time this comes up, I joke that the first thing Iâ€™ll be doing is sleeping. Forty years of work is a long time, and Iâ€™ve earned a long nap.
